task.title: How to Use the Epson Projector

context.p: Luckily, the Epson projector has already been set up in both Shanks 180 and 360. It is very simple to use this projector for your presentations.

step.cmd: Lower the projector screen. Instructions found in "How to Lower the Projection Screen."
Log into the Mac desktop computer that is on the main desk near the front of the classroom.
Locate the Epson remote. It should be on the main desk and it will look like this:
Press the power button on the Epson remote.

info.note: This will turn on the projector. Once the projector is turned on, your computer screen will be immediately projected onto the projector screen.

step.cmd: If you would like for your computer screen to freeze for whatever reason, press the "freeze" button on the Epson remote. To un-freeze, press "freeze" again.
